name: 不鏽鋼

pages.text: $(thing)Stainless Steel$() and $(thing)Chromium$() are $(thing)Steel-tier$() metals added by Firmalife. They are used in the construction of $(l:tfc:firmalife/greenhouse)Stainless Steel Greenhouses$().
鉻鐵礦是一種熔融後可以得到鉻的礦石. 它在$(thing)侵入岩$()和$(thing)變質岩$()可以找到.
$(li)花崗岩$()$(li)閃長巖$()$(li)輝長岩$()$(li)板岩$()$(li)千枚巖$()$(li)片岩$()$(li)片麻岩$()$(li)大理岩$()
pages.title: 所有可能含鉻的岩石種類
